video:video.video:title: Learn Roslyn Now - E08 - The AdHocWorkspace
video:video.video:description: The AdHocWorkspace is a mutable workspace that makes it easy to add documents and projects to. It's very useful for testing and is the easiest workspace to get up and running. Intro to Workspaces:&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Learn Roslyn Now - E07 - VisualStudioWorkspace
video:video.video:description: In this episode, we take a look at building Visual Studio extensions that interact with Roslyn using the VisualStudioWorkspace. Intro to Workspaces:&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Learn Roslyn Now - E06 - MSBuildWorkspace
video:video.video:description: In this episode, we take a look at the workspace API and the MSBuildWorkspace. More on Workspaces: https://joshvarty.wordpress.com/2014/...Tool used in this video: http://comealive.io

video:video.video:title: Learn Roslyn Now - E05 - Semantic Model and Symbols
video:video.video:description: In this episode we take a look at how we can use the Semantic API to gain access to symbols represented by pieces of syntax. More on the Semantic Model: https://joshvarty.wordpress.com/2014/...Tool&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Learn Roslyn Now - E04 - The CSharpSyntaxRewriter
video:video.video:description: An introduction to the CSharpSyntaxRewriter and how we can use it to rewrite syntax trees.Tool used in this video: http://comealive.ioBlog Post: https://joshvarty.wordpress.com/2014/...

video:video.video:title: Learn Roslyn Now - E02 - The Syntax Tree API
video:video.video:description: In today's episode we'll find out how to navigate the syntax tree and create new syntax nodes. Syntax Trees and LINQ: https://joshvarty.wordpress.com/2014/07/06/learn-roslyn-now-part-2...Syntax Nodes&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Learn Roslyn Now - E01 - Introduction to Roslyn Tooling
video:video.video:description: Introduction to Roslyn tooling.NET Compiler Platform SDK: https://visualstudiogallery.msdn.micr...Source Browser: http://source.roslyn.io
